With his team [[Chakra Transfer Technique|lending him chakra]], Akaboshi can slam his hand onto the ground and cause lightning to spread from his hand to underneath the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* The name of this technique appears to come from {{translation|"Denkō Sekka"|電光石火|Lightning Flash}}, an idiom used for "lightning speed". In this technique, the first part is changed to {{translation|"Denpō"|電報|lit meaning=telegram}}, likely a reference on how the target is hit from a distance.
* Though all four members use chakra for this technique, it only seems to take properties of Lightning Release, when the chakra reaches Akaboshi.
